verses.text:
I find the precious Jesus, I find the present Jesus,
I find the precious Jesus, That Jesus is all to me;
I find the precious Jesus, I find the present Jesus,
I find the precious Jesus, And safe to all eternity.

My hopes are all in Jesus, My hopes are all in Jesus,
My hopes are all in Jesus, He saved me from my sin;
My hopes are all in Jesus, My hopes are all in Jesus,
My hopes are all in Jesus, And lives and reigns within.

My all is found in Jesus, My all is found in Jesus,
My all is found in Jesus, He's all the world to me;
My all is found in Jesus, My all is found in Jesus,
My all is found in Jesus, And Jesus is all to me.

chorus.text:
Jesus is all to me,
Jesus is all to me;
Jesus is all to me,
Jesus is all to me.
